Walgreens Refining Pink Clay Mask

Brand: Walgreens

Category: Mask

Ingredients: (WATER), KAOLIN, BENTONITE, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER, GLYCERIN, PROPANEDIOL, THEOBROMA CACAO (COCOA) SEED BUTTER, ILLITE, (FRAGRANCE), SALIX ALBA (WILLOW) BARK EXTRACT, MARIS SAL (SEA SALT), SODIUM ANISATE, SCLEROCARYA BIRREA (MARULA) SEED OIL, CITRIC ACID, CITRONELLOL, GERANIOL, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, BENZYL SALICYLATE
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
